title.narrative: 2.3. PUBLIC KNOWLEDGE AND AWARENESS RAISING - VAC

description.narrative: Increased public knowledge and awareness of children's rights to protection and rejection of violence, including gender-based violence, abuse, exploitation, neglect and impunity of crimes against children, which contributes to Child Protection Systems, Data And Child Protection, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By the end of 2019, girls and boys benefit from and access decentralized child protection mechanisms and programmes that prevent and protect them from violation of rights, primarily violence, abuse, exploitation and neglect.

CENTRO DE INVESTIGACION PARA LA PREVENCION DE LA VIOLENCIA EN CENTROAMERICA

sector.narrative: Social and behaviour change communication on violence, exploitation and abuse
Technical assistance - Prevention and response services for violence against children
Violence, exploitation, and abuse - surveys (e.g. KAP, VACS), data analysis/research/evaluation evidence generation, synthesis, and use

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Increased public knowledge and awareness of children’s rights to protection and rejection of violence, including gender-based violence, abuse, exploitation, neglect and impunity of crimes against children

description.narrative: Se desarrollaron dos estudios de Conocimientos, Actitudes y Prácticas -CAP- uno sobre violencia sexual, unión temprana y embarazo en adolescentes; y, otro sobre niñas, niños y adolescentes sobre formas de autoprotección contra la violencia. Además, se desarrolló un diagnóstico de normas sociales con adultos, sobre los derechos de la niñez. Se desarrolló una propuesta para implementar un Observatorio de Violencia contra la Niñez en la Procuraduría de los Derechos Humanos -PDH-. | Status:Constrained | As-of Date:31/12/2019

title.narrative: Number of reported cases of crimes against children.
Existence of mechanisms for regular collection and dissemination of official data on the situation of violence against children in the country

target.value: 2018:An Observatory on Violence Against Children is being designed
